# Milestone Templates

This document provides templates for creating milestones in the cin7-pendo-api project.

## üìÖ **Sprint Milestone Template**

### **Sprint X: [Sprint Theme]**
**Duration**: 2 weeks
**Sprint Master**: [Name]
**Start Date**: [Date]
**End Date**: [Date]

#### **Sprint Goal**
[Brief description of the main sprint objective and expected business value]

#### **Stories and Tasks**

##### **High Priority (P1)**
- [ ] **[Issue #XXX]** - [Title] (5 story points)
  - **Owner**: [Assignee]
  - **Definition of Done**: [Acceptance criteria]
  - **Dependencies**: [Any blockers]

- [ ] **[Issue #XXX]** - [Title] (3 story points)
  - **Owner**: [Assignee]
  - **Definition of Done**: [Acceptance criteria]
  - **Dependencies**: [Any blockers]

##### **Medium Priority (P2)**
- [ ] **[Issue #XXX]** - [Title] (2 story points)
  - **Owner**: [Assignee]
  - **Definition of Done**: [Acceptance criteria]
  - **Dependencies**: [Any blockers]

- [ ] **[Issue #XXX]** - [Title] (2 story points)
  - **Owner**: [Assignee]
  - **Definition of Done**: [Acceptance criteria]
  - **Dependencies**: [Any blockers]

##### **Low Priority (P3)**
- [ ] **[Issue #XXX]** - [Title] (1 story point)
  - **Owner**: [Assignee]
  - **Definition of Done**: [Acceptance criteria]
  - **Dependencies**: [Any blockers]

#### **Technical Tasks**
- [ ] **Refactoring**: [Component/Module] refactoring (2 story points)
- [ ] **Performance**: [Performance improvement] (1 story point)
- [ ] **Testing**: Add test coverage for [feature] (1 story point)
- [ ] **Documentation**: Update [documentation] (1 story point)

#### **Definition of Done**
- [ ] Code is reviewed and approved
- [ ] All tests pass (unit, integration, E2E)
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] Performance meets requirements
- [ ] Security review completed
- [ ] Accessibility compliance verified

#### **Sprint Metrics**

- **Team Capacity**: [Available]
- **Velocity Goal**: [Expected completion]

#### **Risks and Dependencies**
- **Risk**: [Description] - [Mitigation Strategy]
- **Dependency**: [Description] - [Contingency Plan]

#### **Testing Requirements**

##### **Unit Testing**
- [ ] New features have ‚â•90% test coverage
- [ ] Bug fixes have regression tests
- [ ] All tests pass consistently

##### **Integration Testing**
- [ ] API endpoints tested end-to-end
- [ ] Database interactions verified
- [ ] Third-party integrations validated

##### **E2E Testing**
- [ ] Critical user journeys tested
- [ ] Cross-browser compatibility verified
- [ ] Mobile responsiveness confirmed

##### **Performance Testing**
- [ ] Load testing meets targets
- [ ] Bundle size analysis completed
- [ ] Memory usage verified

##### **Security Testing**
- [ ] Security audit completed
- [ ] Penetration testing performed
- [ ] Vulnerability scan passed

#### **Documentation Updates**
- [ ] **API Documentation**: Updated for new endpoints
- [ ] **User Documentation**: New features documented
- [ ] **Developer Documentation**: Code examples updated
- [ ] **Release Notes**: Comprehensive release notes

#### **Release Checklist**

##### **Pre-Release**
- [ ] All code is merged to main branch
- [ ] All tests pass in CI/CD
- [ ] Security scan completed
- [ ] Performance benchmarking completed
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] Release notes prepared

##### **Release Process**
- [ ] Version number updated
- [ ] Release branch created (if needed)
- [ ] Production deployment tested
- [ ] Rollback plan ready
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting configured

##### **Post-Release**
- [ ] Smoke tests passed in production
- [ ] User acceptance testing completed
- [ ] Performance metrics collected
- [ ] Error monitoring active
- [ ] User feedback collected

#### **Release Metrics**

##### **Quality Metrics**
- **Test Coverage**: [Percentage]%
- **Bug Count**: [Number] resolved, [Number] introduced
- **Performance**: [Metrics] targets met
- **Security**: [Issues] resolved

##### **Business Metrics**
- **User Adoption**: [Expected]%
- **Performance Improvement**: [Expected]%
- **User Satisfaction**: [Target] score
- **Revenue Impact**: [Expected] impact

#### **Known Issues**
- [ ] **Issue #XXX** - [Description] - [Workaround if any]
- [ ] **Issue #XXX** - [Description] - [Workaround if any]

#### **Post-Release Plans**
- **Follow-up Release**: [Date] - [Focus]
- **Next Sprint**: [Theme] - [Priorities]
- **Monitoring**: [Areas to watch]
- **User Feedback**: [Collection methods]

## üìã **Usage Guidelines**

### **Creating Milestones**

#### **Step 1: Choose Template**
- Use sprint template for 2-week iterations
- Use release template for version launches
- Use roadmap template for quarterly planning
- Use specialized templates for specific initiatives

#### **Step 2: Customize Template**
- Replace placeholder text with specific information
- Add relevant issues and dependencies
- Set realistic dates and deadlines
- Include specific acceptance criteria

#### **Step 3: Link Issues**
- Link all relevant issues to the milestone
- Assign appropriate labels and priorities
- Ensure proper team assignments
- Set up dependencies and blockers

#### **Step 4: Monitor Progress**
- Track milestone completion regularly
- Update progress as issues are completed
- Identify and address blockers early
- Adjust timeline as needed

### **Best Practices**

#### **Milestone Naming**
- Use clear, descriptive names
- Include version numbers for releases
- Include sprint numbers for iterations
- Use consistent naming conventions

#### **Timeline Management**
- Set realistic deadlines
- Include buffer time for unexpected delays
- Break large milestones into smaller tasks
- Regularly review and adjust timelines

#### **Progress Tracking**
- Update milestone progress regularly
- Use GitHub project boards for visibility
- Communicate progress to stakeholders
- Celebrate milestone completions

---

*These templates provide a foundation for consistent milestone creation and management in the cin7-pendo-api project.*
